medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 weeks ago with mild abdominal pain in the right lower quadrant that worsened over the last day. Pain became more severe, especially with movement. Patient reports feeling better with pain medication but pain has not resolved. He denies nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, fevers, chills, and malaise. This pain is unlike any he has experienced before.
medical_history.family_history: No known inflammatory bowel disease or colorectal cancer
